website_summaries.verdict: Designed for safety, strength, and longevity, the X-Bull is a dependable anchor winch that reels in its stainless steel line more quickly than you may expect.
cons: A fairly expensive electric anchor winch, but it’s an especially reliable model

customer_reviews.title: Great one time use smoke machine. Terrible winch.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it started smoking. Then the wires melted everywhere. Also pretty cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: This winch can compete with the best of them
customer_reviews.text: This winch can compete with the best of them. Major power and a great fit on the front of my JK. Customer service was top notch. I would highly recommend this winch to anyone in the market for a real workhorse.
customer_reviews.author: richard breen

customer_reviews.title: Works great I'd mounted on my 18 foot flat bed trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great I'd mounted on my 18 foot flat bed trailer to tow broken down cars and makes easy to load them in to the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Loaiza Vega

customer_reviews.title: ... the crossbars out of the casting the remote works awesome
customer_reviews.text: more power than the guide can handle will pull a car onto the trailer even without any wheels on it just make sure not to wind the cable all in one spot or this winch will snap the crossbars out of the casting the remote works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winch for my setup.
customer_reviews.text: I am overall very pleased with this winch. Let me first say, I did have a problem with one of the wireless remotes. The remote kept switching off while using the winch. I contacted the seller, they quickly replied and are replacing the remote +++++++. I wish i could shorten the cable. Its way to much line for my needs. But unfortunately, the end is swaged on at the drum. The winch has plenty of power, I am winching on a few thousand pound oak logs onto my trailer using an log arch. Overall, very pleased so far, I would recommend buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Make sure company provides assembly instructions and proper installation instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Giving 1 star now as Winch does not come completely assembled and does not have assembly instructions! So at this time we have no idea if the winch works! Can not find customer service phone number. Waiting on customer service to contact us! Will review at later date#
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this winch. We hooked it up per the directions and the winch only works on the in function. Also the winch automatically reels itself in as soon as connected to power with no remote involved. Solenoid may be bad and you can't just get a solenoid for the winch. Going local now
customer_reviews.author: Mccaden Hjelm

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I love this electric winch, it sets very well in my front bumper, only used it 4 times and on the 4th time using, the Bull, it winched out but made a grinding noise and stopped pulling? I would like to get a replacement, if at all possible. I think I purchased the year warranty, I know they give you a 30 day return policy, but I did not use it for a couple of months. I dont know why, but sounds like metal grinding?. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Keith Adcock

customer_reviews.title: but it pulls like 12, 000 LBS holy cow not lacking in ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is it weighs 100 LBS. but it pulls like 12,000 LBS holy cow not lacking in muscle!! If it doesn't pull it to you it will pull your truck to it..lol I love it, price was just right!
customer_reviews.author: Secretariat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this winch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this winch! There's no catch other than probably a startup company trying to break into the market. The winch is solid and mounts well to my custom bumper. Very powerful and the remotes are awesome. I've got one mounted to my dash in the cab of my RAM 3500. With the two remotes, I can control the winch from the dash or externally. It can be controlled via the hardwired handheld as well. Great torque and I have not had an issue using it in the Oregon rough country. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shirar

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great Recovery Winch. Was a little damaged on receipt but the was the carriers fault. X-Bull replaced the broken control box, hand control and 2 remotes. Has plenty of power. I broke the steel cable on second pull but that was my fault. Think I went well over 12,000 lbs. Maybe 20,000 lbs. But the winch handled it like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: fscoglio

customer_reviews.title: Check gear engagement and disengagement before install.
customer_reviews.text: The first time i used it i could not get it to go back in gear after i disengaged it. Took me 20 minutes of playing with it in a very dangerous situation. I did not have time to send it back before a trip so i took it apart and found the problem i believe either it has a design flaw in the gear box or was missing a piece. i was able to space the middle planetary gear set with 2 o-rings to keep it from jamming. seems to work fine now. but i haven't put a load on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hank T

customer_reviews.title: Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The button on the remote gets bumped very easy and runs the battery down. The remote works great with a good battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Winch For The Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to mount on my trailer that I haul cars on. This winch is stout. With all it's wires and etc. it's kindof a lot to find a place for. And, when you go to use it, do not disengage the spool. The cable will un-ravel everywhere and it's a real pain in the A$$ to get back on halfway straight. Keep pressure on the cable all the time. Comes with two wireless remotes that come in very handy. Good winch, I'm satisfied! Looking forward to using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Josh McKinley

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH REMOTE IR WIRING DIAGRAM! Will try to return.
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT COME WITH REMOTE IR WIRING DIAGRAM! Will try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I pulled my 65 f250 with a seized brake drum onto my hauler
customer_reviews.author: aaron Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Surprised with performance would recommend actually planning to buy another
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t hopeful at 330$ but I was wrong it’s a good winch. Pulled my 07 dually on a trailer in just under 40 seconds. One thing to add befor u use this product do yourself a favor and buy a swivel and bigger hook You’ll thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Drew Peanutsac

customer_reviews.title: ITS JUNK DONT WASTE YOUR $$
customer_reviews.text: Pure Juuuunk 12,000lb rating and a 3500lb car broke it pulling it 10ft broke the entire winch in 1/2 thanks for ripping me out of over $300 will never buy this junk brand again 😡 havent even had the thing a year smh
customer_reviews.author: tyler g.

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AWESOME ONCE MOUNTED !!
customer_reviews.text: it came in really fast great conditions, not a single scratch I had to forced it a little to fit into the GoRhino Front bumper but other than that fits perfect !! i totally recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Came with two wireless remotes and one wired. This sucker is heavy. Ship weight was 90 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: dorie leland

customer_reviews.title: CRAPPY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Bought the winch in July 2020, Used it three times. On the third time the gear box on the winch came apart and would not work at all going in or out. Just wasted $300. I did not expect it to be as good as a Warn Winch, but three uses and it broke and no warranty? I will spend my money somewhere that I get a warranty. Very pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Power problem
customer_reviews.text: couldn’t pull my partially stripped Jeep out of a mud hole, remote rarely works
customer_reviews.author: Nick Barton

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a month of light use. Cannot use anymore. Not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mom630310

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Bolt pattern was the same as old winch, easy to mount. Remote is great, looking forward to first opportunity to put it to work.
customer_reviews.author: R Sea

customer_reviews.title: It works !!
customer_reviews.text: 2 wireless remotes. One was crushed in handling but still works .... comes with a spare it's all good
customer_reviews.author: Grandude

customer_reviews.title: Housing shattered
customer_reviews.text: First time i used the winch the housing shattered. Wasn’t even a big load.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Weighs about 90lbs. Winch worked well for pulling some cars out of a place i couldnt get my truck. Couldnt get the wireless remotes to connect though and the bolt holding the cable in place got stripped out
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby's use. He's a happy camper so that says it all.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and durable. One of the best wench's i have bought!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time using the winch and it burnt out. It was less than 6 months old, been trying to go through the warranty process to get it replaced and the company won’t even get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has issues either by default of travel related .
customer_reviews.text: Unit came with control box busted in many pieces . have to use a wrench to disengage for free spool . works ok otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the remotes were bad
customer_reviews.text: one of the remotes was bad emailed x-bull about it I will update post if issues is resolved other than that the winch seems to do a good job
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Great winch
customer_reviews.text: Great winch. Has way to much cable on the spool. Jams up. Had to remove 15 feet of cable.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Willhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Winch has great power, Seller stands behind their product 100% Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Nice winch
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. very strong winch. I use it for loading logs weighing over 5000LBs
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Great winch. Tested and proven on super duty.
customer_reviews.text: Pulled my 2017 F250 in park sitting on asphalt. Tested and confirmed. Mounts easily to many winch trays. I have it mounted to a fab fours bumper brush guard. I don't typically do reviews, but this winch needs to be given the credit that it deserves. If they make a 15k+ winch. I'm all in. I did not get any discount for this review.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time mounted easy worked great
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time mounted easy worked great..now to get stuck in mud and see if she will pull the Jeep
customer_reviews.author: stephen short

customer_reviews.title: ... tested it yet but set up and operation seems good, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t load tested it yet but set up and operation seems good, very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: ... trailer yet but I am sure it will be great. very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because I haven't installed it on my trailer yet but I am sure it will be great. very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Benson

product_meta.title: X-BULL 12V Steel Cable Electric Winch 12000 lb Load Capacity
product_meta.description:
Product Description
X-BULL 12V WIRELESS STEEL CABLE ELECTRIC WINCH 12000LBS/5443KGS

This X-BULL ATV 12000lbs winch is made to be a highest performance and reliable product. 
It provides strong power to recover your vehicle when it is stuck under various circum
stances in the off-road adventure.

Product Features
Motor Protection Function
Three-stage Planetary Gear System
Super Big Power
Power In & Power Out Motor for Positive Load Control
Automatic Load-Holding
Braker for Maximum Safely
High Tensile Steel Cable
Free Spooling Clutch for Fast Wire Rope Payout
Heavy Duty Sealed Contactor
Wire/Wireless Remote Control Model for Easy Operation
4-Way Roller Fairlead
Quiet and Efficient
Waterproof and Corrosion Resistan

Condition: Brand New
Single Line Rated Pull: 12000LBS/5443KGS
Motor: 4.5KW, Series Wound
Controller: Remote Switch
Gear Train: 3 Stage Planetary
Gear Ratio: 265:1
Braking: Automatic Load-Holding Brake
Battery Recommended: 650 CCA Minimum
Fairlead: 4-Way Roller Fairlead
steel cable: 9.5mm × 26m
Drum Size: 64mm × 224mm
Dimensions: 530mm × 165mm × 235mm
Bolt Pattern: 254mm × 114mm
Net Weight: 88LBS

IN THE BOX

12000LBS DC 12V Winch × 1
Clevis Hook × 1
et of Bolts × 1
Set of Wire Cables × 1

Notice：
1. please read the instructions carefully and wire according to the instructions. Winches are electrical products that can cause short circuits and heat or smoke if wiring is wrong.
2.We suggest that you find a professional to install. If there are any problems on the installation, please feel free to consult at any time.
feature_bullets: Bonus One Wireless Remote Controllers + One Hand Controller
Power In & Power Out Motor for Positive Load Control
Free Spooling Clutch for Fast Wire Rope Payout

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
